# Horizontal Rules

## Asterisks

Content above.

***

Content below.

## Asterisks with Spaces

Above.

* * *

Below.

## Many Asterisks

Above.

*****

Below.

## Hyphens

Above.

---

Below.

## Hyphens with Spaces

Above.

- - -

Below.

## Many Hyphens

Above.

---------------------------------------

Below.

## Underscores

Above.

___

Below.

## Underscores with Spaces

Above.

_ _ _

Below.

## In Context

This is a section.

---

This is the next section.

---

And another section.
